# Read App Clip Domain Debug Status Information for a Build Bundle

**Web Service Endpoint**

Get the debug status of the domain you associate with your App Clip for a specific build bundle.

## Getting Build Bundle Information

- **Read the App Clip Domain Cache Status Information for a Build Bundle**: Get the cache status of the domain you associate with your App Clip for a specific build bundle.
- **List All Beta App Clip Invocations for a Build Bundle**: Get all App Clip invocations you configure for testing for a specific build bundle.
- **List All File Sizes for a Build Bundle**: Get all file sizes for a specific build bundle.
- **GET /v1/buildBundles/{id}/relationships/appClipDomainCacheStatus**
- **GET /v1/buildBundles/{id}/relationships/appClipDomainDebugStatus**
- **GET /v1/buildBundles/{id}/relationships/betaAppClipInvocations**
- **GET /v1/buildBundles/{id}/relationships/buildBundleFileSizes**
